hero.subtitle: Comfort, Safety, Convenience — your new standard for rides with MLT.

about.title: Who we are?
about.card1_p1: MLT is the founder of Georgia's first taxi and transfer aggregator platform, as well as the CabiCo app for convenient ride-hailing.
about.card1_p2: We are your source for calling comfortable taxis and transfers, created for you with a Georgian vision and heart.
about.card1_p3: Our fleet consists of comfortable and modern cars, where everyone can find a vehicle to their taste!
about.card2_p1: One of our main advantages: we collect absolutely no data (including payment data) about users and do not sell it to third parties.
about.card2_p2: We do not use cookies or sell them to search aggregators. We have no hidden sub-services, paid subscriptions, or hidden fees.
about.card2_p3: We are proud of our users and provide them with the best experience interacting with our services.
about.card3_p1: MLT is an official partner of Yandex and Bolt, providing drivers with the best conditions for work.
about.card3_p2: We offer the lowest commissions in Georgia, stable payouts, and a flexible schedule.
about.card3_p3: We do not charge any hidden fees or dues from our drivers. Our slogan is - Transparency in everything.

services.title: What we offer
services.card1_desc: A convenient and intuitive application for quickly ordering taxis and transfers.
services.card2_desc: Comfortable airport transfers, intercity trips, as well as transfers between Georgia and Armenia.
services.card3_desc: Comfortable taxis with experienced, multilingual, and polite drivers.
services.card4_desc: A fast, comfortable, and most importantly — safe service for your daily routine.

app_promo.subtitle: Our application provides direct access to comfortable rides throughout Georgia. Fast, convenient, and most importantly — private. Minimalist design, convenience in all aspects. Install, order, travel!
